meta.job_title: JDE E1/AX D365 Business Analyst Intern

duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist Business Analysts with the design, training, configuration, testing, and support of the RF-SMART data collection software application for ERP systems.
Shadow Business Analysts during training sessions where detailed warehouse data collection solutions using RF-SMART are delivered.
Learn and research best practices for application design, setup, testing, and training.
Assist in installing and testing customer-approved enhancements made to the base application.
Troubleshoot and address reported issues from Customers.
Set up meetings or calls between Customers and Business Analysts.
Monitor shared email address and triage Customer requests.

education_certification.credential: Working towards a degree in a supply chain related discipline or equivalent work experience.
Working knowledge of an ERP supply chain or warehouse management software solution desirable.
Good written and verbal communication skills.
Self-motivated with ability to work independently.
